name: Magnett Technologies
description: services provider of home & commercial U
overview:
Magnett Technologies started its business operations in the year 2010 at Bengaluru in Karnataka, India. Established as a Sole Proprietorship business venture, we have emerged as one of the leading solutions and services provider in the area of power back-up, power conditioning and energy efficiency.

Our Product Range: KENT Water Purifiers Computer UPS Power Conditioners Batteries Solar Energy Solutions

Vendor Base: With the premier aim to offer quality-assured product range to our customers, we have joined hands with leading market manufactures. These market players are selected on the basis of detailed market survey and research conducted by our skilled procurement agents.

Our Strengths: Being a professionally managed organization, we are able to establish ourselves across the major markets of the nation. We are into offer quality-tested and reliable products to our clients that can be availed at industry leading rates.

Our Team: We have deployed a skilled pool of professionals, who specializes in their area domain. Professionals recruited by us possess extensive industrial acumen and rich product knowledge. We complete rely on their in-depth expertise to accomplish varied organization goals and satisfy widespread client base.
